text: The 2019 Mercer Bears football team represents Mercer University in the 2019 NCAA Division I FCS football season. They are led by seventh-year head coach Bobby Lamb and play their home games at the Five Star Stadium. They are sixth year members of the Southern Conference (SoCon). ==Previous season== The Bears finished the 2018 season 5–6, 4–4 in SoCon play to finish in a three-way tie for fifth place. ==Preseason== ===Preseason media poll=== The SoCon released their preseason media poll and coaches poll on July 22, 2019.
